pullRequest.title: Spring Data Cosmos - fix SpEL test error
pullRequest.bodyText:
There was this error when the spring-data-cosmos integration test run:
org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanExpressionException: Expression parsing failed; nested exception is org.springframework.expression.spel.SpelEvaluationException: EL1058E: A problem occurred when trying to resolve bean 'dynamicContainer':'Could not resolve bean reference against BeanFactory'
	at com.azure.spring.data.cosmos.repository.integration.SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.testDynamicContainerNameWithBeanExpression(SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.java:83)
Caused by: org.springframework.expression.spel.SpelEvaluationException: EL1058E: A problem occurred when trying to resolve bean 'dynamicContainer':'Could not resolve bean reference against BeanFactory'
	at com.azure.spring.data.cosmos.repository.integration.SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.testDynamicContainerNameWithBeanExpression(SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.java:83)
Caused by: org.springframework.expression.AccessException: Could not resolve bean reference against BeanFactory
	at com.azure.spring.data.cosmos.repository.integration.SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.testDynamicContainerNameWithBeanExpression(SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.java:83)
Caused by: org.springframework.beans.factory.NoSuchBeanDefinitionException: No bean named 'dynamicContainer' available
	at com.azure.spring.data.cosmos.repository.integration.SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.testDynamicContainerNameWithBeanExpression(SpELCosmosAnnotationIT.java:83)

It's difficult to reproduce this error locally and this PR is trying to fix this error.

I took @kushagraThapar's advice to run all tests in IDEA, and the issue could be reproduced.

commit.message: try to fix SpEL test error

nodes.bodyText: Please change it to separate imports, we do not use * imports.
Probably an unused import, pls check.

commit.message: try another way to add debug info
